name: Apache Ignite
description: An in-memory computing platform for transactional, analytical, and streaming workloads delivering in-memory speeds at petabyte scale.

name: Alluxio
description: A virtual distributed storage system. It bridges the gap between computation frameworks and storage systems, enabling computation applications to connect to numerous storage systems through a common interface.

name: Hazelcast
description: A clustering and highly scalable data distribution platform.
